database.sql:
select * from VALUES ('10100012342','522553.7879646093', '227060.35121496912','0',CURRENT_TIMESTAMP()), ('10100012343','522613.98079332826', '227023.9709338752','1',CURRENT_TIMESTAMP()), ('10100012344','522734.3664507663', '227069.61165015664','0',CURRENT_TIMESTAMP()), ('10100012345','522592.15262467193', '226906.89257471848','1',CURRENT_TIMESTAMP());
--select CASEID, XCOORD, YCOORD, CASESTATUS --from LGNCC_CASEVIEW LCV --inner join LGNCC_ENQUIRYTYPE LET on LCV.TYPEID = LET.IDkey --inner join lgncc_eventMapping LEM on LET.ID = LEM.typeId --where LEM.eventCode = ? --4000031 --order by LCV.ENQUIRYID desc;

xsl.xsl:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?> <xsl:stylesheet version="1.0" xmlns:xsl="http://www.w3.org/1999/XSL/Transform" xmlns:flt="http://www.lagan.com/wsdl/FLTypes" xmlns:dfor="http://kana.com/dforms" exclude-result-prefixes="dfor">
<xsl:template match="/"> <dfor:markers> <xsl:for-each select="//map"> <dfor:marker> <dfor:longitude><xsl:value-of select="entry[string[1]='C2']/string[2]" /></dfor:longitude> <dfor:latitude><xsl:value-of select="entry[string[1]='C3']/string[2]" /></dfor:latitude> <dfor:title><xsl:value-of select="entry[string[1]='C1']/string[2]" /></dfor:title> <xsl:variable name="status" select="entry[string[1]='C4']/string[2]"/> <xsl:choose> <xsl:when test="$status = '1'"> <dfor:icon>/dformresources/content/MapPin-Red1.png</dfor:icon> </xsl:when> <xsl:otherwise> <dfor:icon>/dformresources/content/MapPin-Green2.png</dfor:icon> </xsl:otherwise> </xsl:choose> <dfor:description></dfor:description> </dfor:marker> </xsl:for-each> </dfor:markers> </xsl:template>
</xsl:stylesheet>

database.sql:
DECLARE @xcoordmin VARCHAR(30) DECLARE @xcoordmax VARCHAR(30) DECLARE @ycoordmin VARCHAR(30) DECLARE @ycoordmax VARCHAR(30) DECLARE @opencaseAge VARCHAR(3) DECLARE @closedcaseAge VARCHAR(3) DECLARE @formName VARCHAR(30) DECLARE @faultTypeClause VARCHAR(500)
SET @xcoordmin = ? SET @xcoordmax = ? SET @ycoordmin = ? SET @ycoordmax = ? SET @formName = ? SET @opencaseAge = 180 -- this has been reduced from 180 for testing SET @closedcaseAge = 60
IF @formName = 'hcc_hfr_animals' BEGIN SET @faultTypeClause = '''(AN1) ANIMALS'',''(AN1) ANIMALS DMA'',''Animals''' END IF @formName = 'hcc_hfr_bus' BEGIN SET @faultTypeClause = '''Bus Shelters And Bus Stops''' END IF @formName = 'hcc_hfr_cctv' BEGIN SET @faultTypeClause = '''Cctv/anpr/trafic counts '',''Safety Cameras''' END IF @formName = 'hcc_hfr_fencing' BEGIN SET @faultTypeClause = '''(FN1) FENCING/UNLIT BOLLRD/POSTS DMA'',''Fencing or posts (unlit bollards)'',''Fencing/posts (unlit Bollards)'',''Fencing/unlit bollrd/posts ''' END IF @formName = 'hcc_hfr_flooding' BEGIN SET @faultTypeClause = '''(FL1) FLOODING AND DRAINAGE'',''(FL1) FLOODING AND DRAINAGE DMA'',''Flooding And Drainage''' END IF @formName = 'hcc_hfr_footways' BEGIN SET @faultTypeClause = '''Footway And Verges'',''Footway/verge/embankment '',''Footways, Cycletrack, Verge and Embankments'',''(FV1) FOOTWAYS, VERGES AND EMBANKMENTS'',''Trip hazard''' END IF @formName = 'hcc_hfr_graffiti' BEGIN SET @faultTypeClause = '''Graffiti''' END IF @formName = 'hcc_hfr_highways' BEGIN SET @faultTypeClause = '''Highway Bridges And Walls''' END IF @formName = 'hcc_hfr_lighting' BEGIN SET @faultTypeClause = '''(SL1) DEFAULT LIGHTING/LIT FEATURES - Damaged or missing (LT08)'',''(SL1) LIGHTING/LIT FEATURES'',''(SL1) LIGHTING/LIT FEATURES DMA'',''Lighting/lit features '',''Lights/Bollards/Belisha Beacon'',''Lights/bollards/belisha beacons''' END IF @formName = 'hcc_hfr_obstruction' BEGIN SET @faultTypeClause = '''(OB1) OBSTRUCTION / ENCROACHMENT'',''(OB1) OBSTRUCTION / ENCROACHMENT DMA'',''Obstruction'',''Obstruction / encroachment ''' END IF @formName = 'hcc_hfr_road_cycle_lane' BEGIN SET @faultTypeClause = '''Road and cyclelane '',''Road or cycleway'',''(CW1) DEFAULT ROAD AND CYCLE LANE - Pothole (CW06)'',''(CW1) ROAD AND CYCLE LANE'',''(CW1) ROAD AND CYCLELANE DMA'',''Carriageway/road/cycleway'',''(NR) Streetworks'',''Streetworks'',''Traffic And Parking Issues''' END IF @formName = 'hcc_hfr_row' BEGIN SET @faultTypeClause = '''Public rights of way '',''(RW1) PUBLIC RIGHTS OF WAY''' END IF @formName = 'hcc_hfr_signalcam' BEGIN SET @faultTypeClause = '''(SC1) SIGNAL/CAMERAS/RSNG BLLRD DMA'',''Signal/cameras/rsng bllrd '',''Traffic Signals''' END IF @formName = 'hcc_hfr_signs' BEGIN SET @faultTypeClause = '''(SG1) SIGNS AND STREET NAME PLATES'',''Signs And Street Name Plates'',''Signs/street names plate ''' END IF @formName = 'hcc_hfr_trees' BEGIN SET @faultTypeClause = '''(TV1) DEFAULT TREES AND VEGETATION - Hedge Overgrown (TV02)'',''(TV1) TREES AND VEGETATION'',''(TV1) TREES AND VEGETATION DMA'',''Trees And Vegetation''' END IF @formName = 'hcc_hfr_utilities' BEGIN SET @faultTypeClause = '''Utilities ''' END IF @formName = 'hcc_hfr_winter_service' BEGIN SET @faultTypeClause = '''(WM1) WINTER SERVICE'',''Winter Maintenance'',''Winter service ''' END
/*PULLS FROM STAGING TABLE IN HERTS DB POPULATED BY DB JOB */ DECLARE @sqlStmt NVARCHAR(4000) SET @sqlStmt = 'SELECT caseref,xcoord,ycoord,status,opened_date_time FROM herts.dbo.FAULT_REPORTING_LAST_6_MONTHS ' SET @sqlStmt = @sqlStmt + 'WHERE opened_date_time > DATEADD(d, - ' + @opencaseAge + ', { fn NOW() }) AND status = ''1''' SET @sqlStmt = @sqlStmt + 'AND faulttype in (' + @faultTypeClause + ')' SET @sqlStmt = @sqlStmt + ' AND xcoord between ' + @xcoordmin + ' AND ' + @xcoordmax SET @sqlStmt = @sqlStmt + ' AND ycoord between ' + @ycoordmin + ' AND ' + @ycoordmax SET @sqlStmt = @sqlStmt + ' UNION ALL SELECT caseref,xcoord,ycoord,status,opened_date_time FROM herts.dbo.FAULT_REPORTING_LAST_6_MONTHS ' SET @sqlStmt = @sqlStmt + 'WHERE opened_date_time > DATEADD(d, - ' + @closedcaseAge + ', { fn NOW() }) AND status = ''0''' SET @sqlStmt = @sqlStmt + 'AND faulttype in (' + @faultTypeClause + ')' SET @sqlStmt = @sqlStmt + ' AND xcoord between ' + @xcoordmin + ' AND ' + @xcoordmax SET @sqlStmt = @sqlStmt + ' AND ycoord between ' + @ycoordmin + ' AND ' + @ycoordmax
/*PULLS FROM REALTIME TABLES */ /*DECLARE @sqlStmt NVARCHAR(4000) SET @sqlStmt = 'SELECT e.caseref,isnull(op.xcoord,cl.xcoord) as xcoord,isnull(op.ycoord,cl.ycoord) as ycoord,e.status,e.CreationDate as opened_date_time from laganprod14.dbo.LGNCC_ENQUIRY e left join laganprod14.dbo.LGNCC_CASEHDR op on op.CaseID = e.CaseID left join laganprod14.dbo.LGNCC_CLOSEDCASEHDR cl on cl.CaseID = e.CaseID inner join laganprod14.dbo.LGNCC_CASEFORMINSTANCE cfi on cfi.CaseID = e.CaseID inner join laganprod14.dbo.LGNCC_FORMINSTANCE fi on fi.ID = cfi.FormInstanceID inner join laganprod14.dbo.LGNFS_EHIGHWAYSFAULT cf on cf.UNIQUEID = fi.DATARECORDID' SET @sqlStmt = @sqlStmt + ' WHERE e.CreationDate > DATEADD(d, - ' + @opencaseAge + ', { fn NOW() }) ' SET @sqlStmt = @sqlStmt + ' and isnull(op.ycoord,cl.ycoord) is not null ' SET @sqlStmt = @sqlStmt + ' and isnull(op.xcoord,cl.xcoord) is not null ' SET @sqlStmt = @sqlStmt + ' AND e.status = ''1''' SET @sqlStmt = @sqlStmt + ' AND cf.faulttype in (' + @faultTypeClause + ')' SET @sqlStmt = @sqlStmt + ' AND isnull(op.xcoord,cl.xcoord) between ' + @xcoordmin + ' AND ' + @xcoordmax SET @sqlStmt = @sqlStmt + ' AND isnull(op.ycoord,cl.ycoord) between ' + @ycoordmin + ' AND ' + @ycoordmax SET @sqlStmt = @sqlStmt + ' UNION ALL ' SET @sqlStmt = @sqlStmt + ' SELECT e.caseref,isnull(op.xcoord,cl.xcoord) as xcoord,isnull(op.ycoord,cl.ycoord) as ycoord,e.status,e.CreationDate as opened_date_time from laganprod14.dbo.LGNCC_ENQUIRY e left join laganprod14.dbo.LGNCC_CASEHDR op on op.CaseID = e.CaseID left join laganprod14.dbo.LGNCC_CLOSEDCASEHDR cl on cl.CaseID = e.CaseID inner join laganprod14.dbo.LGNCC_CASEFORMINSTANCE cfi on cfi.CaseID = e.CaseID inner join laganprod14.dbo.LGNCC_FORMINSTANCE fi on fi.ID = cfi.FormInstanceID inner join laganprod14.dbo.LGNFS_EHIGHWAYSFAULT cf on cf.UNIQUEID = fi.DATARECORDID' SET @sqlStmt = @sqlStmt + ' WHERE e.CreationDate > DATEADD(d, - ' + @closedcaseAge + ', { fn NOW() }) ' SET @sqlStmt = @sqlStmt + ' and isnull(op.ycoord,cl.ycoord) is not null ' SET @sqlStmt = @sqlStmt + ' and isnull(op.xcoord,cl.xcoord) is not null ' SET @sqlStmt = @sqlStmt + ' AND e.status = ''0''' SET @sqlStmt = @sqlStmt + ' AND cf.faulttype in (' + @faultTypeClause + ')' SET @sqlStmt = @sqlStmt + ' AND isnull(op.xcoord,cl.xcoord) between ' + @xcoordmin + ' AND ' + @xcoordmax SET @sqlStmt = @sqlStmt + ' AND isnull(op.ycoord,cl.ycoord) between ' + @ycoordmin + ' AND ' + @ycoordmax*/
--PRINT @sqlStmt
EXEC sp_executesql @sqlStmt

xsl.xsl:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?> <xsl:stylesheet version="1.0" xmlns:xsl="http://www.w3.org/1999/XSL/Transform" xmlns:flt="http://www.lagan.com/wsdl/FLTypes" xmlns:dfor="http://kana.com/dforms" exclude-result-prefixes="dfor">
<xsl:template match="/"> <dfor:markers> <xsl:for-each select="//map"> <dfor:marker> <dfor:longitude><xsl:value-of select="entry[string[1]='xcoord']/string[2]" /></dfor:longitude> <dfor:latitude><xsl:value-of select="entry[string[1]='ycoord']/string[2]" /></dfor:latitude> <dfor:title><xsl:value-of select="entry[string[1]='caseref']/string[2]" /></dfor:title> <xsl:variable name="status" select="entry[string[1]='status']/string[2]"/> <xsl:choose> <xsl:when test="$status = '1'"> <dfor:icon>/dformresources/content/MapPin-Red1.png</dfor:icon> </xsl:when> <xsl:otherwise> <dfor:icon>/dformresources/content/MapPin-Green2.png</dfor:icon> </xsl:otherwise> </xsl:choose> <dfor:description></dfor:description> </dfor:marker> </xsl:for-each> </dfor:markers> </xsl:template>
</xsl:stylesheet>

<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?> <xsl:stylesheet version="1.0" xmlns:xsl="http://www.w3.org/1999/XSL/Transform" xmlns:flt="http://www.lagan.com/wsdl/FLTypes" xmlns:dfor="http://kana.com/dforms" exclude-result-prefixes="dfor">
<xsl:template match="/"> <dfor:form-data></dfor:form-data> </xsl:template>
</xsl:stylesheet>

<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?> <xsl:stylesheet version="1.0" xmlns:xsl="http://www.w3.org/1999/XSL/Transform" xmlns:flt="http://www.lagan.com/wsdl/FLTypes" xmlns:dfor="http://kana.com/dforms" exclude-result-prefixes="dfor">
<xsl:template match="/"> <dfor:form-data> <dfor:field> <dfor:name>txt_queue</dfor:name> <dfor:value> <xsl:choose> <xsl:when test="//dfor:field[dfor:name='location']/dfor:value = 'other'">other_queue</xsl:when> <xsl:otherwise>sheffield_queue</xsl:otherwise> </xsl:choose> </dfor:value> </dfor:field> </dfor:form-data> </xsl:template>
</xsl:stylesheet>

<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?> <xsl:stylesheet version="1.0" xmlns:xsl="http://www.w3.org/1999/XSL/Transform" xmlns:flt="http://www.lagan.com/wsdl/FLTypes" xmlns:dfor="http://kana.com/dforms" exclude-result-prefixes="dfor">
<xsl:template match="/"> <flt:FLPropertyID> <flt:ObjectType>D3</flt:ObjectType> <flt:ObjectReference> <xsl:value-of select="//dfor:field[dfor:name='propertyid']/dfor:value" /> </flt:ObjectReference> </flt:FLPropertyID> </xsl:template>
</xsl:stylesheet>

xsl.xsl:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?> <xsl:stylesheet version="1.0" xmlns:xsl="http://www.w3.org/1999/XSL/Transform" xmlns:flt="http://www.lagan.com/wsdl/FLTypes" xmlns:dfor="http://kana.com/dforms" exclude-result-prefixes="dfor flt">
<xsl:template match="//flt:FWTProperty"> <dfor:markers> <dfor:marker> <dfor:longitude> <xsl:value-of select="GPSItmGeoCode" /> </dfor:longitude> <dfor:latitude> <xsl:value-of select="GPSUtmGeoCode" /> </dfor:latitude> <dfor:title> <xsl:value-of select="BriefDetails/ObjectID/flt:ObjectReference[1]" /> </dfor:title> <dfor:icon></dfor:icon> <dfor:description> <xsl:value-of select="BriefDetails/flt:ObjectDescription" /> </dfor:description> </dfor:marker> </dfor:markers> </xsl:template>
</xsl:stylesheet>
